import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get event fee package"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/events/{EventId}/fee-package"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the fee package configuration and totals for a specific event. Use this endpoint to display pricing details, fee rules, or invoice-ready summaries tied to an event.

**Prerequisites**
1. **EventId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/events/query](/docs/api/events/get-events-by-query-post) and extract `Items[].EventId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Locate the event: [POST /api/v1.0/events/query](/docs/api/events/get-events-by-query-post) -&gt; extract `Items[].EventId`.
2. Fetch fee package: [GET /api/v1.0/events/\{EventId\}/fee-package](/docs/api/events/get-event-fee-package).
3. Use the returned data to render fee breakdowns or confirm charges.

**Minimal Required Fields**: EventId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"EventId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Fee package retrieved.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing fee package information.","properties":{"Item":{"type":"object","description":"Fee package information for an event.","properties":{"EventId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"TotalFees":{"type":"number"},"FeeItems":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object"}}},"title":"FeeSchedulePackage"},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned by the API when a request fails.","properties":{"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code associated with the failure","example":401},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the error","example":"Attempted to perform an unauthorized operation."}},"required":["StatusCode","Message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}},"title":"FeeSchedulePackageResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
